Literature.Title: A significantly enhanced antibacterial spectrum of D-enantiomeric lipopeptide bactenecin.
Literature.Author: Sim JY, Kim S, Lee J, Lim H, Kim HH, Park ZY, Kim JI

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=2-4µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CCARM 2180(MIC=32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii KCCM 1053(MIC=32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1605(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCCM 40510(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=4-8µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=16µM),Enterococcus faecalis KCCM 11814(MIC=>64µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51575(MIC=32µM)
